name: Tap the Road
description:
- Tap the road Jack and don’t you drop down
- No more! No more! No more! No more!
- Tap the road Jack and don’t you drop down no more!..

Do you like a smell of petrol in the morning?
So it’s your time to drop the hammer in this old school racing madness!

• 4 new tracks every day;
• Advanced betting system to increase your winnings;
• 5 cars to win;
• Miracle Bonus Race as daily award.


Tap a lane to jump into it.
Tap it repeatedly to speed up.

Be careful! Don’t drop down of the roads!
But hurry up - Deadly Wall follows you!
